definition: swallowtail butterfly
phoenix
surname Feng
butterfly/CL:隻|只[zhi1]
family Papilionidae (taxonomy)

sentences.english: The red marks of the wings and tail's projections are the characteristics of spangle .
sentences.chinese: 黑鳳蝶的特點是紅色的花紋和翅膀後邊兒有突起。

sentences.english: Some kinds of big black swallowtails have been seen in Awaji island.
sentences.chinese: 幾個種類不同的大黑鳳蝶在淡路島經常看到了。

sentences.english: The citrus swallowtail, beautiful and animate, gave happiness to this family.
sentences.chinese: 美麗而富有生氣的柑橘鳳蝶，給這個家帶來了歡樂。

sentences.english: I saw a tiger swallowtail butterfly.
sentences.chinese: 我看見一隻虎斑燕尾鳳蝶。

sentences.english: Researchers at the University of Cambridge studied an Indonesian butterfly known as the peacock or swallowtail.
sentences.chinese: 劍橋大學的研究人員研究了一種印度尼西亞鳳蝶。
